title: Lost and Found Inquiry
description: A guest who checked out yesterday calls to report they may have left a phone charger in their room.

tasks.description: Identify the caller and the room they stayed in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the guest's previous stay details.

tasks.description: Check the digital lost and found log for any items found in that room.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the log and finds an entry for a 'white iPhone charger' found in that room.

tasks.description: Confirm the item with the guest and arrange for it to be mailed to their home address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the item belongs to the guest and processes a shipping request.
